Sentencas: Reversible solid oxide cells (RSOCs) have attracted increasing attention due to the potential realizing the deep coupling between hydrogen and electricity.
Titulo: A highly active and stable hybrid oxygen electrode for reversible solid oxide cells

Sentencas: An efficient and stable oxygen electrode is needed for developing RSOCs.
Titulo: A highly active and stable hybrid oxygen electrode for reversible solid oxide cells

Sentencas: Herein, we report a nanostructured hybrid with a nominal composition of BaZr0.2Co0.8O3-delta as oxygen electrode.
Titulo: A highly active and stable hybrid oxygen electrode for reversible solid oxide cells

Sentencas: The chemical composition, crystal structure and physicochemical properties of the BaZr0.2Co0.8O3-delta-hybrid have been characterized.
Titulo: A highly active and stable hybrid oxygen electrode for reversible solid oxide cells

Sentencas: The results show that the sintered BaCo0.8Zr0.2O3-delta has grown into a hybrid, consisting of cubic perovskite BaZr0.82Co0.18O3-delta, hexagonal perovskite BaCo0.96Zr0.04O2.6+delta and a small quantity of hexagonal perovskite BaCoO3.
Titulo: A highly active and stable hybrid oxygen electrode for reversible solid oxide cells

Sentencas: The cell with BaZr0.2Co0.8O3-delta hybrid oxygen electrode delivers a current density of 2.09 A cm(-2)
Titulo: A highly active and stable hybrid oxygen electrode for reversible solid oxide cells

Sentencas: @0.7 V in SOFC mode, and gives-1.43 A cm(-2)
Titulo: A highly active and stable hybrid oxygen electrode for reversible solid oxide cells

Sentencas: @1.3 V in SOEC mode for steam electrolysis.
Titulo: A highly active and stable hybrid oxygen electrode for reversible solid oxide cells

Sentencas: The BaCo0.8Zr0.2O3-delta cell shows a smooth transition from SOEC to SOFC, and gives no obvious degradation after 100 times SOEC <-> SOFC cycle operation.
Titulo: A highly active and stable hybrid oxygen electrode for reversible solid oxide cells

Titulo: A highly active and stable hybrid oxygen electrode for reversible solid oxide cells
